8.ara-name: كتاب الصوم عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Muhammad bin Ka'b narrated:"I went to Anas bin Malik during Ramadan and he was about to travel. His mount was prepared for him, and he put on his traveling clothes, then he called for some food to eat, and I said to him: 'Is it Sunnah?' He said: 'It is Sunnah.' Then he rode

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِيمَنْ أَكَلَ ثُمَّ خَرَجَ يُرِيدُ سَفَرًا
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About The One Who Ate And Then Went Out To Travel
